component.text:
Topology
Use this topology diagram as a reference for the scenarios. Click Button 2 to continue.

Activity - Scenario 1: Troubleshoot EIGRP Neighbor Issues
EIGRP is having a neighbor adjacency issue and is unable to get route updates from Router 3 (R3). Use the topology diagram and the command output to determine the most likely cause of this issue. Drag the most likely reason for this EIGRP issue to the field next to Router 1 (R1). Click Button 3 to continue.
You have successfully identified the most likely cause of the EIGRP issue for this scenario. Click Button 3 to continue.
You have not successfully identified the most likely cause of the EIGRP issue for this scenario. Please click Reset to try again.

Activity - Scenario 2: Troubleshoot EIGRP Neighbor Issues
EIGRP is having a neighbor adjacency issue and is unable to get route updates from both Router 1 (R1) and Router 3 (R3). Use the topology diagram and the command output to determine the most likely cause of this issue. Drag the most likely reason for this EIGRP issue to the field next to Router 2 (R2).
You have successfully identified the most likely cause of the EIGRP issue for this scenario.
You have not successfully identified the most likely cause of the EIGRP issue for this scenario. Please click Reset to try again.
